WRITING.TITLE: I got accepted in to the most prestigious arts school in my city!
WRITING.TEXT: I'm so happy, at first I was not accepted, but I was placed first on the waiting list. Well someone decided to leave yesterday and the school called and told me I was accepted! I feel amazing, I haven't had any of my usual random depressive moments over the last two days! Apologies for my grammar, I'm still really excited!

WRITING.TITLE: [UPDATE] After all this fucking hard work, I'm still not good enough.
WRITING.TEXT:
Original post: http://www.reddit.com/r/offmychest/comments/1aoi7q/after_all_this_fucking_hard_work_im_still_not/
I got a call from the school yesterday. Someone had decided not to attend the school. They informed that I was in now. (I'd been first on the waiting list!) I've have never been happier and I can't wait until next year to start over at a new school, doing what I love with like minded people. I just wanted to thank all you guys for the support and encouragement you gave me!
Lateralus by Tool in ragtime!
/r/androidcirclejerk
SO BRAVE
Nigga Nigga Nigga - Gangsta Rap
Blink 182's self titled
Commenting so I can see this later
I keep getting a red frowny face?
I guess it's not really the whole school factor, just the devastation of not getting in. And knowing that so many people are better than me

WRITING.TITLE: After all this fucking hard work, I'm still not good enough.
WRITING.TEXT: I'm not sure if this is exactly the right place for this, but it seems like it. Anyways, I have been spending the last six months of my life preparing for an audition to an arts school. I practiced so much that the song I was going to do is still ingrained in my brain and I blew my voice out multiple times. I went to the audition and have the best performance of my life. I was feeling so good, even though I almost passed out from anxiety. But then I get my letter today, unsympathetically telling me that I didn't get in. I'm simply not good enough. It hurts so much, I wanted to do this not only for the arts aspect, but to be able to start over at a new school. Far away from my current one where all the guys hate me and the girls seem afraid of me. But now I'm stuck here. I'm pretty sure the only thing keeping me from offing myself is the fact that in on enough meds to kill a fucking elephant. I'm just so angry and sad and I have no output for it and it's eating away at me.
BLIINDSS WIDE OPEEN SO HE CAN SEE YOU INN THE DARRKK WHILLE YOU'RE SLEEPIN
SAMSUNG. WAT R U DOIN. SAMSUNG. STAHP.
I GET KNOCKED DOWN BUTIGETUPAGAIN AND YA NEVER GONNA KEEP ME DOEN

WRITING.TITLE: Serotonin Syndrome?
WRITING.TEXT: So I am currently on 200mg of certraline (Zoloft) a day. Last night I took 375 or so mg of DXM. I felt nothing for a long while and then started feeling really terrible. I got the regular trippy effects, but I also felt like I was going to vomit and I eventually did, multiple times. I was sweating like crazy, my heart was racing and my stomach was making loud gurgling noises. It subsided after about an hour and I went back to enjoying my trip. So I was wondering, is this normal, or is it SS? (Sorry for the bad formatting, I'm posting from my phone.)
Holy shit yes, I can read now, but it's hard. I have to close one eye to see straight

WRITING.TITLE: Took 375mg and not feeling anything
WRITING.TEXT: I took 375mg of DXM in syrup form (with no other ingredients) about an hour ago. I made sure not to eat for an hour and a half before hand, but I'm barely feeling anything right now, did I do something wrong?
Uh, it's probably the kid's computer. He's just in the school's network.
